Title: Cops and Robbers
Plot: Mickey crosses paths with Victor Maher, ex-fraud squad officer, now head of security at a bank. Victor blackmails Mickey into doing something he normally wouldn't do.
GuestStars: Phil Smeeton, Michael Webber, Andrew Buckley, Jane Guernier, Sakuntala Ramanee, Richard Harrington, David Calder, David Walliams
